comment: The developers switched to a monthly subscription model and, instead of adding value to the app, they simply put existing useful features behind a pay wall.  That's a deceptive way of doing business, making this an unreliable service for users concerned about family safety.  For example, the emergency panic button feature now requires a paid account.  Who knows what functionality will be lost next.

author: Mike Guida
comment: This app USED to be great, but now it can never find anyone. Turns out they moved that feature to pay accounts only. I have 4 kids and want to be able to find them all, but now I'm limited and can't do that anymore. It's unfortunate because this was the best app up until it became money required.

author: Dallas Fields
comment: Constantly notifying you that you left and arrived left and arrived all the time when you didn't even leave it was a good app then they updated it and now you can only have 3 locations for free. 3 star

reply.author: Familonet
reply.content:
Hey Dallas,

thanks for your feedback. Can you please contact me at cedrik@familo.net I want to help you to fix the constant notifications.

Best wishes
Cedrik

author: Hollywood
comment: Just continues to be unreliable, not showing location of members. Just sits and spins then gives error message of lost connection when none of our phones ever lose connection. Great idea,great look & features,  just doesn't work reliably.

author: comfort enitan
comment: After installation of this app on my phone its asking me for phone no and I input but telling me please enter correct number when I keep entering my own number I had to go recheck my number on my call log if indeed am correct or I made a mistake but seriously am correct with my number. I had to call someone and ask the person of my number and indeed it was still that same number familonet said its not correct. Pls what's happening?

Very impressed with this app. The peace of mind I get with the automatic updates as my family gets to preset places is PRICELESS!! I Do however, wish it was a little more accurate as far as Real Time tracking when my family is on the Move. I bought the premium package so I feel that should be a feature that works as advertised.  Other than that I Love It!!!!

author: Patricia Hastings
comment: I like it, but it needs fine tuning. It often doesn't tell me someone has left or arrived until long after. 2/26/2018: It has been getting more accurate but still tells me someone has location turned off when they really don't. Still very useful and reassuring when my daughter is away from home.

author: Brandi Nickerson
comment: Saved my husband's phone today! He lost it in a field and using the app, then directions, the map took me directly to his phone. Thank you!!!!

author: Lewis Doyle
comment: Doesnt always locate and the settings can be confusing. Ive resolved all my issues with it and so now i can live with it.

reply.author: Familonet
reply.content:
Hello Lewis,

please contact us at cedrik@familo.net. I am sure we can help you to solve the problem.

Best regards
Cedrik

author: Tami Araica
comment: I love this app. It has actually helped us find our phones and helped me to drive to where my husband was waiting for me without an address. We helped my parents install it on their phones.

author: Adrian Boulianne
comment: Very nice app. Gives a piece of mind when the family is out and about. Tracking is a bit iffy. Works about 75 percent of the time.

author: tony phillips
comment: It keeps saying I "left" home when I haven't gone anywhere...please try and fix this problem
I can see where my family is at most of the time.  Sometimes it can't find their location but that doesn't happen much.  Good app.

author: Karen Miller
comment: Love this app, can keep track of my boys and even let's me know when hubby's home, to put the kettle on 😀😀

author: Lucas Meschke
comment: Decent app. Would love the capability to receive notifications when someone leaves a specific location.

author: Sushant Sutar
comment: It does not locates my friend . Stopped working

author: s fair
comment: STILL TAKES FOREVER TO UPDATE LOCATIONS! BLAH!!!

author: Larry Smith
comment: Been wonderful for us, as my wife travels to see family.

author: Jesus Almodovar
comment: Work's great, it has helped me a lot
Its not opening... It keeps on telling me av entred an invalid number...cant you guys help me fix this problem

author: Steve Symonds
comment: Bit slow but ok mostly.
this is good but in groups there are alote of homes cause everyone puts hes home and this is not good

author: Crystal Shepherd
comment: Great, accurate app, helps me keep tabs on everyone. I've used it about 2 yrs now.

author: R-A Williams
comment: I moved from iOS so was pleased to be recommended this app.  Thank you.  It's useful.

author: Szabolcs Horai
comment: The program is good but it's not possible to upgrade to a pro version.
Amazing .... works all time evey time gives you pin point location  Amazing love it

author: Michael Tucker
comment: Still getting it figured out.

author: Syam Said
comment: Been using thia since day 1. Awesome application!!

author: ToughGuy 2016
comment: Helps us keep in touch without lifting a finger!

author: Felix whereareyou
comment: Good tracking app, so far seems reliable

author: Ashraf Muhammad
comment: Danke schon.
Great basic app to keep track of the family.

author: Roseller Agustin
comment: I really love this app..very helpful.!
More improvement

reply.author: Familonet
reply.content: Thank you for your feedback. What can we improve? Please tell us at cedrik@familo.net

author: Tagor H Pakpahan
comment: awesome use monitor all my staffs

reply.author: Familonet
reply.content:
Hey Tagor,

From now on everything works again! We had maintenance work on the server yesterday and were therefore not reachable at night. Now everything again works perfectly. :) It would be nice if you would adjust your rating. If you have any problems, please feel free to contact me at cedrik@familo.net. :)

Best wishes
Cedrik

author: MR. HEIDY AND THE BOOTS ENTERTAINMENT
comment: Pokoe apiklahh...

author: Mary Castillones
comment: Does what it says
It works

author: ShaAz Ss
comment: From the beginning i love this app.

author: Rimi Mukherjee
comment: It's a great app
